original_text: And, behold, one came and said unto him, Good Master, what good thing shall I do, that I may have eternal life?
korean_text: 어떤 사람이 주께 와서 이르되 선생님이여 내가 무슨 선한 일을 하여야 영생을 얻으리이까

sentences.original_text: one came and said unto him
what good thing shall I do
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 무슨 선한 일을 해야 합니까

sentences.original_text: that I may have eternal life?
